mapper.update: update tbl_message set readDate=now() where mid=#{mid}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_message(sender, receiver, message) values(#{sender}, #{receiver}, #{message})
mapper.select: select m.*, u.uname from tbl_message m, tbl_user u where sender=#{sender} and uid=receiver
